com.redhat.rhn.frontend.action

Class CSVDownloadAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • DownloadAction
      • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.action.CSVDownloadAction

  • public class CSVDownloadAction
extends DownloadAction
    Expects that the following parameters are available from the request object: EXPORT_COLUMNS set to the value of the session attribute containing the exportColumns PAGE_LIST_DATA set to the value of the session attribute containg the List of items to export UNIQUE_NAME set to the value of the uniqueName associated with this list from the CSVTag

      • getExportColumns

        protected java.lang.String getExportColumns(HttpServletRequest request,
                                HttpSession session)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns String containing a comma separated list of names to represent the header values of the List or throws Exception if request attribute EXPORT_COLUMNN is missing or session attribute is null.
        Parameters:
        request - HTTP request
        session - HTTP session
        Returns:
        exported columns
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown if request attribute EXPORT_COLUMN is missing.

      • getPageData

        protected java.util.List getPageData(HttpServletRequest request,
                         HttpSession session)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns List of data referred to by session attribute with the name PAGE_LIST_DATA. Throws Exception if request attribute PAGE_LIST_DATA is missing or session attribute is null.
        Parameters:
        request - HTTP Request
        session - HTTP session
        Returns:
        page data
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown if column missing.
